• {{ product.name }}

    {{ product.description }}

import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; type Products = { name: string; description: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'], }) export class ProductsComponent { // @Output() addNewProduct = new EventEmitter(); // products!: Products[] | []; products = [ { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" } ] addNewProduct(){ alert('this works'); } }
